channel.title: Juggle Food Juggling Matiss on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Juggle Food Juggling Matiss on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: MAIDEN
item.description: this weekend ruled. On friday I got my hair done and hung out with severn and some friends.. we got tacos and generally chilled. I then went to bed. it was awesome I love sleeping. So saturday we went to six flags to juggle for the mardi gras event. I don’t understand how mardi gras happens in august.. but whatever. the show was pretty laid back. just matiss and I juggling.
